title: What character do you identify most with and why?
author: whitewalker
content: It"s ten thousand miles between Kings landing and the wall. The winds of Winter. Dunc the Lunk, thick as a castle wall. The bear and the maiden fair. A Lannister always pays his debts. The battle of the redgrass field. Hear me roar! Our Sun Shines Bright. More pigeon pie, please. It"s ten thousand miles between Kings landing and the wall.

comments.author: mskhaleesi
comments.content: Definitely Danaerys Targaryen as you can tell by my username

title: What character do you identify most with and why?
author: mskhaleesi
content: Ezas eshna gech ahilee! Fini hazi? Hash yer dothrae chek asshekh? Ifas maisi yeri. Ki fin yeni? Yer affesi anni. Nevakhi vekha ha maan: Rekke, m"aresakea norethi fitte. Yer zheanae sekke. Jalan atthirari anni. Shekh ma shieraki anni.

title: A Song of Ice & Fire vs. HBO -- the list of differences
author: gotnerd
content: Valor dohaeris. Hen syndrorro, onos. Hen nuqir, perzys. Hen morghot, glaeson. Hen syndrorro, onos. Hen nuqir, perzys. Hen morghot, glaeson. Tubi daor. Valar morghulis. Valar morghulis. Nuhor lir gurenna. Toli rhuqo lotinti, kostilus. Tubi daor. Ao ynoma diniluks?

comments.author: joesand
comments.content: Hodor, Hodor, Hodor, Hodor. Hodor! Hodor, Hodor, Hodor. Hodor? Hodor... Hodor? Hodor... Hodor, Hodor, Hodor, Hodor. Hodor, Hodor, Hodor, Hodor. Hodor!

comments.author: jennismith
comments.content: Dunc the Lunk, thick as a castle wall. A storm of swords. Never Resting. I would like a trial by combat. Bastards are born of passion, arent they? We dont despise them in Dorne. Winter is coming. And now his watch is ended. Winter is coming. Winter is coming. King in the North.
